word:
I have much to say, but not now, in regard to the way in which the work should be carried forward. I have felt 
                                                                           1775
very desirous that Edson should carry forward the work that the Lord has said he should do in the ministry of the word. If he will give himself to this work, if he will humble his heart as the heart of a little child, if he will depend on his heavenly Father, God will bless and strengthen him.
